channel.title: WatcherCast: An Unofficial Buffy Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Lunar Light Studio
channel.description: "Into every generation, there is a chosen one. One girl in all the world. She alone will wield the strength and skill to stand against the vampires, the demons, and the forces of darkness..." except in our case, there's two girls! And they will use the strength of their voices and the sharpness of their wit to discuss the themes and ideas of the classic TV show, Buffy the Vampire Slayer.

ns2:cta.headline: Support WatcherCast: An Unofficial Buffy Podcast
ns2:cta.subtitle: Give back to your favorite content creators.

item.title: Season 1: Episode 3 - The Witch
item.description:
Episode Notes

Welcome back to WatcherCast hosted by Hannah Boyens and Lillian Kraack! WatcherCast is produced by Lunar Light Studio. This episode is all about Buffy the Vampire Slayer Season 1 Episode 3: The Witch.

Check us out on our social media and please review us on iTunes! Tumblr: http://lunarlightstudio.tumblr.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lunarlightstudios Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lunarlightstudio

If you need help, please contact 1−800−799−7233 or 1-800-787-3224 (TTY).

Thank you for listening!!

This podcast is powered by Pinecast.

item.title: WatcherCast: Promo #1
item.description:
Episode Notes

An all new, hilarious, informative, and entertaining podcast all about the hit TV show, Buffy the Vampire Slayer! Come hang out with two college girls as they talk about one of their favorite TV shows and how it changed their lives for the better. WatcherCast premiers on March 1st!

This podcast is powered by Pinecast.
